clinicalFinisher.name: Clinical Finisher
clinicalFinisher.description: Excels in one-on-one situations and converts chances with precision.

powerHeader.name: Power Header
powerHeader.description: Dominates aerial duels and scores crucial headers from crosses and set-pieces.

longShots.name: Long Shots
longShots.description: Capable of scoring spectacular goals from distance with power and accuracy.

poacher.name: Poacher
poacher.description: Instinctive finisher who finds space in the box to score tap-ins and rebounds.

targetMan.name: Target Man
targetMan.description: Physical presence who holds up play and brings teammates into attack.

speedMerchant.name: Speed Merchant
speedMerchant.description: Blazing pace allows them to outrun defenders and exploit space behind the defense.

finesseShot.name: Finesse Shot
finesseShot.description: Places shots with precision and curl rather than raw power.

chipShot.name: Chip Shot
chipShot.description: Master of the delicate chip over the goalkeeper in one-on-one situations.

outsideFootShot.name: Outside Foot Shot
outsideFootShot.description: Uses the outside of the boot to add unpredictability to shots and passes.

powerShot.name: Power Shot
powerShot.description: Strikes the ball with exceptional power, making saves difficult for goalkeepers.

longShotTaker.name: Long Shot Taker
longShotTaker.description: Regularly attempts and converts long-range efforts.

oneOnOneSpecialist.name: One-on-One Specialist
oneOnOneSpecialist.description: Extremely composed when facing the goalkeeper alone.

acrobaticFinisher.name: Acrobatic Finisher
acrobaticFinisher.description: Capable of scoring spectacular goals with volleys, bicycle kicks, and acrobatic efforts.

dribblingWizard.name: Dribbling Wizard
dribblingWizard.description: Exceptional close control and ability to beat multiple defenders in tight spaces.

flairPlayer.name: Flair Player
flairPlayer.description: Unpredictable and creative with a repertoire of tricks and skills.

speedDribbler.name: Speed Dribbler
speedDribbler.description: Uses pace and agility to beat defenders at full speed.

technicalDribbler.name: Technical Dribbler
technicalDribbler.description: Patient dribbler who uses body feints and close control to navigate through defenses.

flair.name: Flair
flair.description: Naturally creative player who attempts the spectacular and entertains crowds.

trickster.name: Trickster
trickster.description: Enjoys showboating and performing skill moves.

ballCarrier.name: Ball Carrier
ballCarrier.description: Excellent at carrying the ball forward through midfield zones.

playmaker.name: Playmaker
playmaker.description: Orchestrates attacks with vision and passing range.

setPieceSpecialist.name: Set-piece Specialist
setPieceSpecialist.description: Master of free-kicks, corners, and dead-ball situations.

vision.name: Vision
vision.description: Sees passes others don't and creates chances with incisive through balls.

throughBall.name: Through Ball
throughBall.description: Specializes in splitting defenses with perfectly weighted through passes.

crossingSpecialist.name: Crossing Specialist
crossingSpecialist.description: Delivers dangerous crosses from wide areas with accuracy and pace.

longPasser.name: Long Passer
longPasser.description: Switches play and finds teammates with precise long-range passes.

pinpointCrossing.name: Pinpoint Crossing
pinpointCrossing.description: Places crosses exactly where attackers want them.

boxToBox.name: Box to Box
boxToBox.description: Covers every blade of grass, contributing both defensively and offensively.

deepLyingPlaymaker.name: Deep Lying Playmaker
deepLyingPlaymaker.description: Controls the game from deep positions with passing and vision.

engine.name: Engine
engine.description: Tireless runner who never stops working for the team.

tirelessRunner.name: Tireless Runner
tirelessRunner.description: Exceptional stamina allows them to maintain high intensity throughout matches.

ballWinner.name: Ball Winner
ballWinner.description: Aggressive tackler who breaks up opposition attacks.

interceptor.name: Interceptor
interceptor.description: Reads the game superbly and intercepts passes before danger develops.

tacklesBack.name: Tackles Back
tacklesBack.description: Tracks back to help the defense when possession is lost.

ballPlayingDefender.name: Ball Playing Defender
ballPlayingDefender.description: Comfortable on the ball and initiates attacks from the back.

noNonsenseDefender.name: No Nonsense Defender
noNonsenseDefender.description: Physical and aggressive defender who clears danger decisively.

aerialDominance.name: Aerial Dominance
aerialDominance.description: Wins almost every aerial duel with positioning and timing.

lastMan.name: Last Man
lastMan.description: Reliable last line of defense with excellent positioning and composure.

slideTackle.name: Slide Tackle
slideTackle.description: Expert at timing slide tackles to win the ball cleanly.

marking.name: Marking
marking.description: Stays tight to opponents and nullifies their attacking threat.

divesIntoTackles.name: Dives Into Tackles
divesIntoTackles.description: Aggressive tackling style that can win the ball but risks fouls.

positioning.name: Positioning
positioning.description: Always in the right place at the right time.

sweeperKeeper.name: Sweeper Keeper
sweeperKeeper.description: Comfortable leaving the box to clear through balls and act as an extra defender.

penaltySaver.name: Penalty Saver
penaltySaver.description: Specialist at saving penalties with good positioning and reactions.

commandOfArea.name: Command of Area
commandOfArea.description: Dominates the penalty area, claiming crosses and organizing the defense.

longThrow.name: Long Throw
longThrow.description: Can launch the ball far downfield with powerful throws.

rushesOutOfGoal.name: Rushes Out Of Goal
rushesOutOfGoal.description: Quickly leaves the line to smother one-on-one situations.

comesForCrosses.name: Comes For Crosses
comesForCrosses.description: Proactive in claiming crosses before attackers can get to them.

punchesFists.name: Punches Fists
punchesFists.description: Prefers to punch crosses away rather than catch them.

gkLongThrow.name: GK Long Throw
gkLongThrow.description: Throws the ball exceptionally far to start counter-attacks.

gkFlatKick.name: GK Flat Kick
gkFlatKick.description: Delivers flat, accurate kicks to teammates downfield.

oneOnOneRush.name: One-on-One Rush
oneOnOneRush.description: Aggressive in rushing out to close down attackers.

secondWind.name: Second Wind
secondWind.description: Gains a stamina boost in the final stages of matches.

naturalFitness.name: Natural Fitness
naturalFitness.description: Rarely gets injured and recovers quickly from minor knocks.

injuryProne.name: Injury Prone
injuryProne.description: Physically fragile with higher susceptibility to injuries.

solidPlayer.name: Solid Player
solidPlayer.description: Reliable and consistent performer week after week.

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: Physical power helps win duels and hold off opponents.

giantThrowIn.name: Giant Throw-In
giantThrowIn.description: Can launch throw-ins deep into the opponent's box like a corner kick.

bigGamePlayer.name: Big Game Player
bigGamePlayer.description: Steps up and performs best in crucial matches and finals.

consistency.name: Consistency
consistency.description: Delivers reliable performances week in, week out.

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.description: Rarely commits unnecessary fouls or receives cards.

twoFooted.name: Two-Footed
twoFooted.description: Equally comfortable shooting and passing with both feet.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.description: Capable of playing effectively in multiple positions.

aerialThreat.name: Aerial Threat
aerialThreat.description: Constant danger from set-pieces and crosses.

powerHouse.name: Power House
powerHouse.description: Imposing physical presence that intimidates opponents.

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: Natural leader who organizes and motivates teammates on the pitch.

composure.name: Composure
composure.description: Remains calm under pressure and makes better decisions in crucial moments.

teamPlayer.name: Team Player
teamPlayer.description: Always puts the team's needs above personal glory.

arguesWithOfficials.name: Argues With Officials
arguesWithOfficials.description: Frequently disputes referee decisions, risking disciplinary action.

driven.name: Driven
driven.description: Intensely motivated to improve and achieve success.

earlyAdopter.name: Early Adopter
earlyAdopter.description: Quick to learn new tactics and adapt to different systems.

oneClubMan.name: One-Club Man
oneClubMan.description: Loyal legend who has dedicated their career to one club.

finesse.name: Finesse
finesse.description: Elegant and technical player who relies on skill over physicality.

playSimple.name: Play Simple
playSimple.description: Keeps things simple and rarely takes unnecessary risks.

leftFootedMaestro.name: Left-Footed Maestro
leftFootedMaestro.description: Exceptional ability with their left foot.

rightFootedSniper.name: Right-Footed Sniper
rightFootedSniper.description: Deadly accurate with their right foot.

weakFoot.name: Weak Foot
weakFoot.description: Struggles when forced to use their weaker foot.

avoidsUsingWeakerFoot.name: Avoids Using Weaker Foot
avoidsUsingWeakerFoot.description: Heavily favors their strong foot even in difficult situations.

cautiousWithCrosses.name: Cautious With Crosses
cautiousWithCrosses.description: Hesitant to claim crosses, preferring to stay on their line.

selfish.name: Selfish
selfish.description: Prioritizes personal statistics over team success.

inflexible.name: Inflexible
inflexible.description: Struggles to adapt to new tactics or positions.

injuryConcern.name: Injury Concern
injuryConcern.description: History of injuries that raise questions about long-term availability.

teamwork.name: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Excellent at combining with teammates and playing cohesively.

Speed Merchant.name: Speed Merchant
Speed Merchant.description: Pure pace to leave defenders in the dust.

Chip Shot.name: Chip Shot
Chip Shot.description: Ability to lob the goalkeeper with subtle touches.

Outside Foot Shot.name: Outside Foot Shot
Outside Foot Shot.description: Uses the outside of the foot for shots and passes with spin.

Long Shot Taker.name: Long Shot Taker
Long Shot Taker.description: Likes to take shots from outside the box.

One-on-One Specialist.name: One-on-One Specialist
One-on-One Specialist.description: Lethal when one-on-one with the goalkeeper.

Acrobatic Finisher.name: Acrobatic Finisher
Acrobatic Finisher.description: Scores goals with volleys and bicycle kicks.

Speed Dribbler.name: Speed Dribbler
Speed Dribbler.description: Carries the ball at high speed without losing control.

Technical Dribbler.name: Technical Dribbler
Technical Dribbler.description: Short, precise dribbles in tight spaces.

Trickster.name: Trickster
Trickster.description: Uses feints and tricks to fool defenders.

Through Ball.name: Through Ball
Through Ball.description: Vision for passes that split the defense.

Tackles Back.name: Tackles Back
Tackles Back.description: Forward who helps win the ball back.

Rushes Out Of Goal.name: Rushes Out Of Goal
Rushes Out Of Goal.description: Goalkeeper who rushes out to close down angles.

Punches Fists.name: Punches Fists
Punches Fists.description: Prefers to punch the ball away.

One-on-One Rush.name: One-on-One Rush
One-on-One Rush.description: Quick to close down space in one-on-one situations.

Aerial Threat.name: Aerial Threat
Aerial Threat.description: Very dangerous from offensive set pieces.

Left-Footed Maestro.name: Left-Footed Maestro
Left-Footed Maestro.description: Exceptional skill with the left foot.

Right-Footed Sniper.name: Right-Footed Sniper
Right-Footed Sniper.description: Lethal accuracy with the right foot.

Cautious With Crosses.name: Cautious With Crosses
Cautious With Crosses.description: Hesitates to come out for crosses.

Inflexible.name: Inflexible
Inflexible.description: Struggles playing out of position or in different tactics.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.noPlayersMatchFilters: No players match your current filters

offers.noOffersDescription: You haven't received any transfer offers this season.

Prodigy.name: Prodigy
Prodigy.description: A young talent with exceptional potential, already making waves in the football world.
Prodigy.quote1: I've dreamed of this since I was a kid. Every day I train to prove I belong at the top.
Prodigy.quote2: Age is just a number. When you're on the pitch, it's about performance.
Prodigy.quote3: I want to be remembered as one of the greatest. That journey starts now.

OnTheRise.name: On the Rise
OnTheRise.description: Showing great improvement and attracting attention from bigger clubs.
OnTheRise.quote1: I feel like I'm getting better every match. The work is paying off.
OnTheRise.quote2: Big clubs are watching? That motivates me even more.
OnTheRise.quote3: I'm hungry for success. This is just the beginning.

EstablishedStar.name: Established Star
EstablishedStar.description: A proven performer who consistently delivers at the highest level.
EstablishedStar.quote1: Consistency is key. I've worked hard to reach this level.
EstablishedStar.quote2: I set the example for the younger players. That's a responsibility I take seriously.
EstablishedStar.quote3: Trophies and records matter, but it's about the legacy you leave.

UnderPressure.name: Under Pressure
UnderPressure.description: Facing criticism and needs to step up their game to prove doubters wrong.
UnderPressure.quote1: I hear the criticism. It fuels me to work harder.
UnderPressure.quote2: Pressure makes diamonds. I'll come back stronger.
UnderPressure.quote3: The only opinion that matters is what I show on the pitch.

Journeyman.name: Journeyman
Journeyman.description: An experienced player who has played for multiple clubs throughout their career.
Journeyman.quote1: Every club has taught me something valuable. I carry those lessons with me.
Journeyman.quote2: Football takes you places. I've made friends and memories everywhere.
Journeyman.quote3: Adaptability is my strength. I give my all wherever I play.

VeteranLeader.name: Veteran Leader
VeteranLeader.description: A respected figure in the dressing room with years of experience.
VeteranLeader.quote1: Experience can't be taught. I try to guide the young ones.
VeteranLeader.quote2: My body might slow down, but my mind reads the game better than ever.
VeteranLeader.quote3: Leadership is about actions, not words. I lead by example.

ForgottenMan.name: Forgotten Man
ForgottenMan.description: Struggling to make an impact and finding opportunities limited.
ForgottenMan.quote1: It's frustrating not to play, but I stay ready.
ForgottenMan.quote2: When my chance comes, I'll take it.
ForgottenMan.quote3: Football is unpredictable. My moment will come.

Flop.name: Flop
Flop.description: Has failed to live up to expectations and is facing significant criticism.
Flop.quote1: I know I haven't met expectations. But I won't give up.
Flop.quote2: Every player goes through tough times. This is my test.
Flop.quote3: I still believe in myself, even when others don't.

ComebackKid.name: Comeback Kid
ComebackKid.description: Making an impressive return after facing setbacks or poor form.
ComebackKid.quote1: Setbacks only made me stronger. I appreciate the game more now.
ComebackKid.quote2: When you fall, you learn how to get back up.
ComebackKid.quote3: This comeback means everything to me. I'm not taking anything for granted.

CultHero.name: Cult Hero
CultHero.description: Loved by the fans for their personality and connection with the club.
CultHero.quote1: The fans are incredible. Their support means the world to me.
CultHero.quote2: I play for the badge and for the people in the stands.
CultHero.quote3: Stats don't show heart. That's what I bring to this club.

HometownHero.name: Hometown Hero
HometownHero.description: A local icon whose bond with the fanbase elevates the club.
HometownHero.quote1: Playing for my hometown club is a dream come true.
HometownHero.quote2: These streets raised me. I want to make everyone proud.
HometownHero.quote3: There's no greater honor than representing where you come from.

PolarizingFigure.name: Polarizing Figure
PolarizingFigure.description: Divides opinion‚Äîmoments of brilliance and moments of frustration.
PolarizingFigure.quote1: Love me or hate me, you're watching. That's what matters.
PolarizingFigure.quote2: I play with passion. Sometimes it boils over.
PolarizingFigure.quote3: I'd rather be talked about than ignored.

PressDarling.name: Press Darling
PressDarling.description: A headline magnet‚Äîcharisma and marketability on full display.
PressDarling.quote1: I enjoy the spotlight. It comes with responsibility.
PressDarling.quote2: Off the pitch, I try to inspire. On it, I let my feet talk.
PressDarling.quote3: Being famous is one thing. Staying grounded is another.

SystemPlayer.name: System Player
SystemPlayer.description: Thrives within structure; contribution exceeds raw numbers.
SystemPlayer.quote1: I make the team tick. Not everything shows up in stats.
SystemPlayer.quote2: The manager's system fits me perfectly. I know my role.
SystemPlayer.quote3: It's about the collective, not individual glory.

InjuryComeback.name: Injury Comeback
InjuryComeback.description: Battling back from injury‚Äîresilience and trajectory under scrutiny.
InjuryComeback.quote1: Rehab tested my mental strength. I'm finally back.
InjuryComeback.quote2: Every day without pain is a blessing now.
InjuryComeback.quote3: The injury changed my perspective. I cherish every minute on the pitch.

update.title: Update Available
update.description: A new version of the game is available with improvements and fixes!

earlyDays.1: Still finding his feet at {team} ‚Äî too early to judge.
earlyDays.2: Early days in the season. Coach giving time to adapt.
earlyDays.3: Few appearances so far. Needs more minutes to show his worth.
earlyDays.4: Just getting started. The sample size is too small to draw conclusions.
earlyDays.5: Settling in period. Let's see how he develops with more game time.

goals.1: Goal drought continues ‚Äî {matches} games without finding the net.
goals.2: Struggling in front of goal. Needs to rediscover his scoring touch.
goals.3: Zero goals in {matches} appearances. Questions being asked about his form.

assists.1: Lacking creativity ‚Äî zero assists in {matches} games this season.
assists.2: Not providing for teammates. Expected more from a {position}.

pos.1: Fans already call him an idol ‚Äî delivery and intensity high.
pos.2: "Another lesson in {style}." Average {rating} speaks for itself.
pos.3: Crowd says he's carrying the {team} ‚Äî {gpg} G/90, {apg} A/90.
pos.4: Absolute baller! {goals} goals already this season.
pos.5: Best signing in years. Worth every penny.
pos.6: This guy is special. Future legend material.
pos.7: Living up to the hype! {rating} average rating doesn't lie.
pos.8: Love watching him play. Pure entertainment.
pos.10: What a player! {goals}G and {assists}A ‚Äî incredible numbers.

neu.2: "Underrated without the ball" ‚Äî pressure and support stand out.
neu.3: Constant production: {goals} G, {assists} A. Next step: killer instinct.
neu.4: Doing okay. Nothing spectacular but nothing terrible.
neu.5: Average performance so far. Room for improvement.
neu.6: Steady contributor. Not a star but not a liability.
neu.7: Still finding his best form. Patience needed.

neg.1: "Needs to decide in big games" ‚Äî fans want more decisive actions.
neg.2: End product below expected ‚Äî consistency in question.
neg.3: Is the {style} role ideal? Debate heats up among fans.
neg.4: Disappointing season. Expected much more from him.
neg.5: Not living up to expectations. Needs to step up.
neg.6: Invisible in big games. Where is he when we need him?
neg.7: Frustrating to watch. Lacks the killer instinct.

shots.1: Makes numbers against weak teams ‚Äî disappears when it matters.
shots.2: All hype, little impact ‚Äî numbers deceive.
shots.3: Overrated ‚Äî system player who doesn't carry the team.

pos.1: Commentators highlight movement and timing ‚Äî looks like a complete {position}.
pos.2: Analysts point to shot selection and chance creation at elite level.

neu.1: Commentators see constant growth; ceiling depends on decisions in final third.
neu.2: Tactical analysts: correct execution; marginal gains can unlock another level.

neg.1: Question impact in big games ‚Äî aggressive marking neutralizes him.
neg.2: Doubts about sustainability without increasing chance quality.

Prodigy.1: "Future star in the making" ‚Äî composure beyond age.
Prodigy.2: Crowd excited: generational ceiling if development continues.

OnTheRise.1: Signs of explosion everywhere ‚Äî rapid upward curve.
OnTheRise.2: Seems ready for a bigger stage next season.

EstablishedStar.1: Leader of {team} ‚Äî sets the standard week after week.
EstablishedStar.2: "Absolute starter" ‚Äî delivers even on bad days.

UnderPressure.1: "Time to prove" ‚Äî crowd divided on patience.
UnderPressure.2: Decisive moment: needs an affirmation performance.

Journeyman.1: Reliable professional ‚Äî keeps teams running wherever he goes.
Journeyman.2: Solid contributor; value often appears in small details.

VeteranLeader.1: Sets the tone in the dressing room ‚Äî standards matter.
VeteranLeader.2: Mentor figure ‚Äî influence goes beyond numbers.

ForgottenMan.1: Scarce minutes ‚Äî needs sequence to recover rhythm.
ForgottenMan.2: On the margins; could a loan revive form?

Flop.1: Price still weighs ‚Äî needs to turn the narrative.
Flop.2: "Below expected" ‚Äî patience of part of the crowd runs out.

ComebackKid.1: Resilience in evidence ‚Äî momentum growing again.
ComebackKid.2: "He's back" ‚Äî confidence returns with each game.

CultHero.1: Soul and heart ‚Äî connection with {team} fans is special.
CultHero.2: "Plays for the badge" ‚Äî moments to remember.

Prodigy.1: Models project excellent trajectory ‚Äî growth curve at top of percentile.

OnTheRise.1: Greater usage, stable efficiency ‚Äî strong sign of sustainable evolution.

EstablishedStar.1: Peak years ‚Äî maintains high floor and high ceiling.

UnderPressure.1: Indicators fell year over year; small sample, but trend to monitor.
